channel.description: Recent content in Pedro on ER Andrinopoulou

item.title: Dynamic prediction modelling in hand disorders after stroke: multivariate latent class mixed model.
item.description:
Pedro Manuel Miranda Afonso

Split-merging techniques to effectively analyze big data with Bayesian joint models

Explore the impact of different data splitting and combining strategies described in the literature to get a consensus posterior for posterior for the joint analysis for recurrent events, terminal event, and longitudinal outcome.
